To install and start Ganache, follow these steps:

1. Download the installation package from https://truffleframework.com/ganache/
2. Install the package.
3. Open the program, and you will see a screen displaying various options like viewing accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
4. Click on "Settings" and set the desired IP, port (set it to 8545), number of accounts, gas limit, etc.
5. Click on "restart" for the settings to take effect.

After completing these steps, Ganache will be running on your local machine with an Ethereum private network bound to port 8545.
